question:
In context with the launch of the X-57 Maxwell, consider the following statements:
  1. It is an electric train.
  2. It was developed by NASA.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The X-57 Maxwell is an all-electric airplane which unveiled on an experimental basis. It has been under experimentation since 2015. It makes used of lithium ion batteries and 14 electric motors. A dedicated simulator was also launched for the Maxwell. Statement 2 is correct: The X-57 Maxwell was launched by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. It is a part of the Civilian Space Program of NASA. The experimental airplane is to be undergo test flight in 2020 from Californiaâ€™s Edward Air Force Base.
